#summary Installing and Initializing
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

  # Download and unpack archive to the location where you want to handle your migrations; this project is designed and intended to be incorporated with other projects and reside within their SVN repositories.
  # CHMOD migrate.php to be executable.
  # Open migrate.php and modify the top line so it points to the path/file of your PHP binary.
  # Make sure you have a valid username/password for your MySQL database server and have already created the database on which you will be performing migrations against.
  # On the command line, run the following and answer the prompts: ./migrate.php init
